{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SerComm |model=H500-s |revision=v1 (Vodafone) |ean=8430208012420 |image1=h500s-case.png |est_release_date=01/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability=Vodafone |type=wireless router, dsl modem, CPE |pcb_id=BXK00C-1.6 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63167 |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |cpu2_brand=Quantenna |cpu2_model=QT3740BC |cpu2_cspeed=500 |cpu2_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G18AC-TI |fla2=64 KiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L512E |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |ram2=128 |ram2_brand=Nanya |ram2_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63167 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi2_chip1_model=QT3740BC |wi2_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi2_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53134S;BCM53134SKFBG; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz WLAN Front End Module;Microsemi;LX5586H;MSC, 586H, 730F;4; ,,, 2ch 150V Tracking miSLIC FXS Interface IC;Microsemi;Le9672WQC;;1; |flags=ADSL2+,VDSL2,VoIP,UMTS |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=vodafoneXXXX, vodafoneXXXX_5G |default_ssid_regex=vodafone[A-F0-9] |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=VF-ESVodafone-H-500-s |oui=78:81:02 |oui_eth=78:81:02 }} :Model Name: '''Vodafone H500-s''' ([[SerComm]])
"BXK00C-1.6" and "1735" is silkscreened on the board.
===Specifications=== *Flash: [http://www.macronix.com/en-us/products/NOR-Flash/Serial-NOR-Flash/Pages/spec.aspx?p=MX25L512E&m=Serial%20NOR%20Flash&n=PM1669 Macronix MX25L512E] 64KB (Serial NOR) :512Kbit (x1/x2) 3V CMOS Flash Memory *[http://www.macronix.com/en-us/products/NAND-Flash/SLC-NAND-Flash/Pages/spec.aspx?p=MX30LF1G18AC&m=SLC%20NAND&n=PM2133 Macronix MX30LF1G18AC] 128MB (SLC NAND) :1Gbit x8 4-bit ECC 48-pin TSOP 3V SLC Flash *RAM: [http://www.nanya.com/cn/Product/3755/NT5CC64M16GP-DII Nanya NT5CC64M16GP] 128MB (DDR3L) :1Gbit 64Mx16 1.35V 96-Pin VFBGA SDRAM
===Links=== *[http://gualdacomunicaciones.blogspot.ru/2017/01/el-nuevo-router-avanzado-para-fibra-de.html Press release] *[https://alexfernandez.es/blog/2017/11/07/abrir-puerto-443-en-vodafone-h500-s/ ''Vodafone H500-s''] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/sercomm/h500-s Sercom H 500-s OpenWrt Wiki]
===Source code=== *[https://mega.nz/#!K1JmCaDJ!MQ1mt8_jf5ydx1oXqr712mlTeNCdadrc24s5ezSRWqM H500s V3305.rar]
